critique: The executive order aims to convey a sense of seriousness and determination in response to a perceived threat. It invokes legal authority and declares a national emergency, suggesting a need for decisive action. The order likely intends to instill a sense of fear regarding the threat posed by Serbia and Montenegro, as well as a sense of surprise at the declaration of a national emergency. It also conveys a sense of disgust at the actions of the Governments of Serbia and Montenegro.
